name: [Colombia] Fissure
description:
Game Make for the Women Game Jam ,  Colombia  

The them of the  jam was independence and we wanted to show different items that are usually not acting by them self, their movement and acting us usually linked to something else .

Fissure is a 3d adventure-puzzle game where  a robot is scrapped and is trying to buit itself again, the game starts with the hand of a robot walking through the world trying to find its other parts.

 Team 

Sandra Serrano - Character 3d modeling and animations
